{{Wired embedded system |brand=HP |model=t410 |revision=(H2W23AT) |asin=B009F1CRZQ;GB;,B009F1CRZQ;CA; |newegg=N82E16859107892 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |price=200 |est_release_date=11/2012 |type=thin client |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TMS320 (DM8148);TMS320DM8148, DaVinci Digital Media Processor; |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406EM2I-12G |fla2=4 GiB |fla2_brand=SanDisk |fla2_model=SDIN7DP2-4G |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63FFR-PBC |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=4 |serial=yes,, 9-pin header,, (115200 8N1),, COMA |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8033 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2K Serial EEPROM;STMicro;24C02WP;;1;,,, 7-Port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2517-JZX;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MAX3243C;;1;,,, Mixed Signal Microcontroller;Texas Instruments;MSP430F5309;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Audio Codec;Texas Instruments;TLV320AIC3106;;1;,,, Component Video Graphics D/A System;Texas Instruments;THS8200;;1;,,, DisplayPort to HDMI/DVI Converter;Parade Technologies;DP501HDM;;1;,,, High Input Voltage 150mA LDO Regulator;ANPEC Electronics;APL5155;;1;,,, 2A Transient Response Linear Regulator;ANPEC Electronics;APL5337;;1;,,, 30V 10.5A N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;5;,,, 30V 12A P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4407A;;1;,,, Dual N-Channel Trench Power MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4214DDY;;1;,,, Quadruple Bus Buffer Gates w/ 3-State Outputs;TI:SN74ACHT125;;1;,,, Power Management Unit with DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS659113;;1;,,, Low Voltage Synchronous Buck Controller;ON Semi;NCP1587;;1;,,, 4.5-17V 5A Synchronous Step Down Converter;TI;TPS54521;;1;,,, 2A Ultra Low Dropout LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9025;;2;,,, 1.5A Dual Channel Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2182;;2; |flags=Audio in/out (3.5mm), RTC w/ battery backup, DisplayLink, VGA out, buzzer, power switch |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |oui_eth=D4:F5:13, 84:7E:40 }} {{TagLine|HP t410 Smart Zero Client}} :[https://www.hp.com/us-en/thin-clients/t410.html Product page]
"Atlas Rev.A MB", "11036-1", "48.3FF02.011" and "MADE IN CHINA" :are silkscreened on board bottom
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] TMS320 (DM8148) @1GHz :ARM (Cortex-A8), 256KB L2 cache with [https://www.ti.com/ds_dgm/images/fbd_sprs647e.gif ''Neon'' FPU] *GPU: PowerVR SGX530 (OpenGL ES2.0, OpenCL 1.1) *Video: DisplayPort (1.1a), VGA *Storage: 8MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 4GB (eMMC) *Memory: [[SK hynix]] 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V/2A via barrel
===See also=== :;[[HP]] • [https://www.hp.com/us-en/thin-clients.html Thin Clients] *[[HP t5325]] Thin Client :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6281 @1.2GHz :RAM: 512MB (DDR2), Flash: 512MB *[[HP t5335z]] Thin Client :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88AP510 @1.0GHz :RAM: 1GB (DDR3), Flash: 512MB *[[HP t310]] G2 (AiO) Zero Client :CPU: ''TERA'' 2321 PCoIP Zero Client :RAM: 512MB (DDR3-1333), Flash: 32MB (SPI) *[[HP t410 Smart Zero Client]] :CPU: [[TI]] TMS320 (DM8148) @1GHz (1 core) :RAM: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM @400MHz *[[HP t430]] Thin Client :[[Intel Celeron]] N4020 @1.1GHz/2.8GHz (2 cores, 4MB L2 cache) :4GB (DDR4-2400) SDRAM (onboard) *[[HP t540]] Thin Client :CPU: [[AMD]] R1305G ''Ryzen'' Embedded w/ ''Radeon Vega 3'' Graphics :RAM: 16GB (DDR4-2400) SDRAM *[[HP t640]] Thin Client :CPU: [[AMD]] R1505G @2.4GHz/3.3GHz (2 cores, 1MB cache) :RAM: 16GB (DDR4) dual-channel SDRAM *[[HP t740]] Thin Client • w/ ''Radeon Vega 8'' Graphics :CPU: [[AMD]] V1756B ''Ryzen'' @3.25GHz/3.6GHz (4 cores, 2MB cache) :RAM: 16GB (DDR4) dual-channel SDRAM
